title: Trump touts himself as 'Acting President of Venezuela'
shortDescription: Trump told Cuba in a social media post to "make a deal" before it's "TOO LATE."

title: Trump weighs military options in Iran
shortDescription: Anti-government protests in Iran have become increasingly deadly as they enter a third week.

title: Trump weighs military options in Iran as violence escalates
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he's considering multiple military options after anti-government protests in the country have turned increasingly deadly.

title: Trump says he's 'inclined' to keep Exxon out of Venezuela
shortDescription: The president told reporters on Air Force One on his way back to Washington that the company's CEO was 'playing too cute.'

title: Trump warns Cuba to 'strike a deal' with US following Venezuela strike
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned Cuba there will be no more oil coming its way and told it to strike a deal, inciting a response from its leaders.

title: Man who carried Pelosi's lectern during Capitol riot runs for office
shortDescription: Adam Johnson, the man known as "Podium Guy" during the Capitol riot on Jan. 6, 2021, is running for office in Florida.

title: What to know about Iran protests as Trump warns the country's leaders
shortDescription: Violent crackdowns on anti-government protesters in Iran are drawing attention from Trump and condemnation from international human rights groups.

title: Machado's Nobel Peace Prize cannot be given to Trump
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader MariÃÅa Corina Machado will not be able to hand over her 2025 Nobel Peace Prize to President Donald Trump.

title: Trump's feud with Walz reaches new heights after Minnesota ICE shooting
shortDescription: The Trump administration is fighting with Minnesota officials over Renee Good's killing after months of attacks from the president.

title: Mamdani, Trump and the pull to the edges amid midterms' discontent
shortDescription: Take over Greenland, anyone? Open government-run grocery stores? The politics of 2026 will not be for the faint of heart.

title: Nobel Institute says Machado cannot transfer Peace Prize to Trump
shortDescription: The Norwegian Nobel Institute said in a statement that Nobel Prizes cannot be 'revoked, shared, nor transferred to others' once awarded.

title: Donald Trump has quick dentist appointment in Florida
shortDescription: The White House motorcade was away from Mar-a-Lago for about two hours.
